climbs.name: Trout Slayer
climbs.fa: Dustin Hoover, Jim Mercer.  Free solo. June 11, 2015

content.description: This route looked much steeper from the parking lot. Upon closer inspection we dropped the rack and soloed it in approach shoes.
content.protection: I suppose you could use some nuts and a few cams but it would be runout.
content.location: When viewing the buttress from the parking lot Trout Slayer is an obvious outward facing corner capped with a small roof. Very central.

content.description: Decent rock not far from the lake itself. If you bring a rack and some tackle you could go from climbing to fishing in minutes. We got so bored slayin' trout we went and put up a route.
